process.title: How does work process goes?
process.step_0_description: We chat to clarify your goals, features, timeline and budget. You can share references, sketches, or anything helpful.
process.step_1_description: I send a clear project outline with scope, timeline, and price. Once confirmed, we move forward.
process.step_2_description: A 30–50% upfront payment secures the project. I begin work based on the agreed plan.
process.step_3_description: You receive updates at key milestones. I welcome feedback and make any needed adjustments.
process.step_4_description: After final approval, you make the remaining payment. I deliver everything as promised — ready to launch or hand over.
